its a stupid idea, sorry.
theres no such thing as micro HD.

running time * bitrate = file size

if there would be a category like it, then where would it begin/end ? people cant even differentiate between SD and HD as you'll find enough 720x480 vids in the HD section as is.
no point in making it even messier.
